title: Control Systems and Sensing Integration Engineer
summary: Imagine what you could do here! At Apple, new insights have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish.
description: In this role you will partner with controls systems developers, motor, actuation, sensor and power electronics engineers to develop and manufacture systems, test stations and evaluation benches for pre-production hardware. You will work on the cutting edge of Apple’s latest motion system endeavors and build high visibility prototypes that lead to production systems!
key_qualifications:
-  Strong fundamentals actuation, control systems design, and motor control.
-  Skilled in rapid integration, prototyping, calibration and testing of actuated and sensor systems.
-  Experience with embedded systems development, analysis and bringup.
-  Expert in Matlab and Simulink with direct experience with deployment on real time target systems such as dSPACE, Speedgoat, or National Instruments HW systems.
-  Experienced with serial communication protocols such as Ethernet, CAN, LIN, UART, SPI, I2C, BISS, etc…
-  Experienced in test and debug of physical systems (sensors, actuators, algorithms)
-  Strong in data analytics, root cause analysis with emphasis on data introspection
-  Experienced with hardware in the loop (HIL) automation
-  Experience with C/C++ development
-  Confident with source control (eg. GIT) on multi developer projects
-  Proficient at English(Listen, Oral, Written, Read)
education_experience: - BS or MS in Engineering or CS + minimum of 10 years of industry experience
additional_requirements:
-  Experience in state estimation deployed on real time hardware
-  Experience in sensor calibration for IMUs, Encoder, Optical Sensors
-  Experience on control system design, modeling and implementation-moto
